every part of the field gets the exact same amount of water like we traditionally do with the large Sprinklers and such um Precision
agriculture or Precision Irrigation for example is let's only water the parts that actually need water because if there's little dips in the field or
things like that water runs down some of the field may get more water than others and so obviously that seems pretty easy
